content:
Hey team

What's the update on https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/34761? looks like everything it is waiting on has been implemented, and I don't see any other discussion regarding it. Thanks
(if you hadn't noticed @pnkfelix's message, #[may_dangle] is not intended for stabilisation)
thanks. but it mentioned "I don't think we intend to" so was wondering if anything changed. looks like not. :slight_smile:
well that's mostly because I like to use cagey language when making statements that could be construed as representing a lang team decision

(there has been no decision, or really even any discussion of this at all for over a year. I just wanted to convey the original intent. In particular, I think this text about
about #[unsafe_destructor_blind_to_params] equally applies to #[may_dangle].)
ah thanks. that clears it :slight_smile:
